settings.text_upper:
Have a passion for retail, fashion and jewellery? ‚Äì we got you!

Want to become a professional body piercer? ‚Äì we‚Äôre here for it!

Love to work for a company that values diversity, individuality and self expression? ‚Äì You‚Äôve come to the right place!

settings.question: Accounts Admin Assistant  - HQ Maroochydore QLD
settings.answer:
Based on-site at our HQ in Maroochydore, and reporting directly to the Financial Controller, you¬†will assist to improve efficiency and capacity in the finance area, and to support the wider leadership team within the business as it continues to grow.

¬†

Key Sills

  • The ability to produce accurate financial reports
  • Excellent attention to detail
  • Ability to practice discretion dealing with sensitive information
  • The ability to work to strict time constraints
  • The ability to prioritise work
  • An organised and methodical approach to a task

¬†

Key Responsibilities¬†

  • Bank Processing and reconciliations
  • Invoice Processing¬†
  • Credit Card Expense Processing
  • Assistance with Staff Travel bookings
  • Assistance with trading data
  • General Ledger ad hoc queries and data review
  • Processing stocktakes and reporting

¬†

This is an amazing opportunity to join SkinKandy in this full-time role in a rapidly growing retail services business. With the benefits of ongoing professional training, career¬†development and progression we encourage you to apply for this exciting position and look forward to receiving your expression of interest here!

settings.question: Performance Marketing Specialist - HQ Maroochydore QLD
settings.answer:
Do you love digital marketing? Do you live and breathe data, advertising and measurement of results? Are you full of creative marketing ideas? If you answered¬†yes¬†to the above, read¬†on!¬†

SkinKandy¬†has¬†a unique opportunity for an experienced¬†Performance Marketing Specialist¬†who can bring their creative vision, passion and analytical mind to our paid advertising space with a large national budget.¬†

We are opening a new store every 3 weeks in 2023 and we're looking for a dynamic professional to join the team and help us keep up with our rapid growth as the largest retailer of our kind in Australia.


About SkinKandy
We are Australia‚Äôs Premier and largest Body Piercing and Jewellery Specialists with over 47 stores nationwide. We‚Äôre known for our awesome company culture, and are set to become Australia‚Äôs fastest growing employer of choice in 2023. This role is based in our HQ in Maroochydore, working closely within our marketing team and reporting directly to our national Marketing Manager. This is a unique opportunity to work with a growing national brand.


About You
We‚Äôre looking for someone who lives and breathes digital strategy, loves data and analytics. You enjoy creating and delivering great digital ads and then measuring their effectiveness. You enjoy working with a fast paced and high performing team and always asking the question ‚ÄúCan we do this better?‚Äù.


Our ideal candidate:
We seek someone who is experienced in all aspects of Google search and social media paid ads, coordinating marketing campaigns and who is happy to assist the team in finding solutions for problems that pop up as we go about our day-to-day roles.¬†

This role is suited to an organised, positive, analytical and vibrant person wishing to join a rapidly expanding Australian company.


Core Role Responsibilities:
You would be responsible for maintaining and creating our digital ads across search and social media alongside working with our team to makes changes in our Shopify website.

Your main duties would include:
Analysing and reporting on our paid search and paid social performance with a large annual marketing budget.

  • Developing and implementing SkinKandy‚Äôs paid media strategy
  • Creating, refining, testing and measuring the effectiveness of campaigns (ROAS focused)
  • Working with our agency partners and internal team to roll out our website roadmap
  • Making basic changes to our Shopify website as needed

You would also be responsible for assisting in other marketing activities, as required such as Google my business, Google shopping and general website assistance (Shopify).

¬†

Essential Skills

  • Able to demonstrate at least 3 years experience managing paid ads
  • Advanced knowledge of Google Ads
  • Advanced knowledge of Google Universal Analytics and Analytics
  • Advanced knowledge of Facebook (Meta) ads manager and business suite¬†
  • Intermediate knowledge of Google Tag Manager
  • Intermediate knowledge of Google My Business and Google Shopping
  • Intermediate knowledge of TikTok and Snapchat advertising
  • Familiarity with Shopify Plus


Desired Skills¬†(not necessary, but highly regarded)

  • SEO Experience
  • Basic coding skills
  • Project Management Experience


Why SkinKandy?

  • Working within a fun, high performing and supportive team
  • Love coming to work at our national headquarters office located in the heart of Maroochydore
  • Thrive in an environment where you are encouraged to be yourself and embrace your individuality
  • Work with a large, national budget/spend
  • The role is well resourced and ready for the right candidate

Apply here

We look forward to receiving your application including your¬†resume¬†and¬†introduction letter¬†describing your approach to¬†Digital Marketing

settings.question: New Store Expressions of Interest - Hornsby NSW
settings.answer:
SkinKandy is Australia's Premier Body Piercing & Jewellery Specialist and we're excited to announce our next Nth Sydney SkinKandy is coming soon ‚Ä¶ and we're looking for a squad of¬†fun, enthusiastic and dedicated peeps for our brand new Hornsby store!

We have multiple roles available; Store Manager, 2IC and Body Piercers/Retail Assistants. All of our positions allow you to get creative and develop your skills as a professional Body Piercer. It's retail - but way more awesome! Our customers have come to know of the consistently high standards that are set for them, so we're looking for creative and passionate peeps to carry on that tradition.

Do you tick these boxes?

  • Body Piercing experience and/or knowledge of piercing types and jewellery
  • A passion for customer service¬†
  • Retail sales expertise and ability to meet or exceed targets
  • Maintaining hygiene standards
  • Cash handling and balancing of the register
  • Opening and closing the store
  • Stock control and management
  • Working autonomously from time to time
  • Love having fun!

SkinKandy is known for having an awesome company culture. We offer a comprehensive Piercing Training Program, further opportunities for development and career advancement, as well as awesome recognition and reward incentives.

Previous exposure to Body Piercing would be very highly regarded however enthusiasm, commitment and a keen interest in piercing and customer experience will see you application stand out!¬†

All SkinKandy body piercers must hold Infection Control Certification (MIC) prior to commencement. ¬†Don't have this? No worries - we will assist you to gain accreditation so you can begin or continue your piercing career!

If this exciting opportunity sound just like you apply below with your resume and introduction letter (and let us know which which position you are applying for)¬†- we can't wait to meet you!

#freetobe

settings.question: Mulit Site Managers - Expressions of Interest
settings.answer:
SkinKandy is moving forward fast and we're looking for Expressions of Interest from dynamic, enthusiastic, and experienced¬†Multi Site Retail Managers¬†to join us on our growth journey!

Our¬†Area Managers¬†play a pivotal role at¬†SkinKandy¬†leading a passionate team of Store Managers and Body Piercers/Retail Assistants to deliver awesome body jewellery services and exceptional customer experiences.

Supported by the National Retail Manager, the¬†Area Manager¬†will assume overall responsibility for the success of up to eight retail stores - ensuring exceptional levels of customer service, store presentation, merchandising and compliance are met and maintained.

We‚Äôre looking fir interst fom those special someones with a unique combination of previous experience in high level retail management, well developed leadership and mentoring abilities and a love for customer service. A genuine interest for body piercing and/or jewellery is beneficial, however we're looking for a passionate senior manager who is capable of leading and motivating a team, driving operational excellence and delivering on sales and KPI expectations along with embodying our brand and values.

Working remotely, you will need to be comfortable with intra-state travel, and demonstrate your ability to manage your time effectively, be flexible, conscientious, and extremely organised.

In return we offer an amazingly fun and supportive team environment, competitive base salary, performance based bonuses and incentives, company vehicle, laptop, a comprehensive piercing training program (if you‚Äôre interested), plus further opportunities for personal and professional development.

Sounds just like you?¬†

Add your Expression of Interest below or email jobs@skinkandy.com

We can't wait to meet you!

settings.question: State Piercing Trainers - Expressions of Interest
settings.answer:
SkinKandy has amazing opportunities to join the market leader in an exciting growth journey!

We're moving forward fast and we're looking for our next talented and dedicated State Piercing Trainers¬†for regions right across Australia!

As¬†a Body Piercing Trainer with SkinKandy your role is to successfully support and progress our staff through our comprehensive piercing training program. Travelling between stores in your region you will be responsible for developing and implementing training plans to ensure our staff progress smoothly and competently to become skilled piercers.¬†

This fulltime role will promote a compliance and safety culture and ensure staff are operating in line with best practice and regulatory compliance standards. Piercing experience is a must and experience training and mentoring staff is also hugely important.

SkinKandy customers have come to know of the consistently high standards that are set for them, so we're looking for creative and passionate peeps to carry on that tradition.

¬†

Key Skills to Thrive in this Role

  • Body Piercing experience, and knowledge of piercing types and jewellery in line with current best practice is essential
  • A genuine passion for the industry
  • Supervision, training, education and supporting staff
  • An ability to role model professional conduct and support our company values.
  • Maintaining hygiene standards
  • The ability to motivate your team to learn and progress their skills
  • Customer Service expertise would be a plus
  • Clear communication skills, reporting and development of training plans
  • Working autonomously
  • Love having fun!

You must hold or be willing to obtain a relevant infection control certification (HLTINF005 or equivalent).

Working remotely, you will need to be comfortable with intra-state travel, and demonstrate your ability to manage your time effectively, be flexible, conscientious, and extremely organised.

What's in it for You

In return we offer an amazingly fun and supportive team environment, competitive salary, performance based bonuses and incentives, company vehicle, laptop, plus further opportunities for personal and professional development plus awesome recognition and reward incentives.

Sounds just like you?¬†

#freetobe


Apply here or follow the link to drop us your deets jobs@skinkandy.com

We can't wait to meet you! üç≠

settings.question: Marketing & eCommerce Executive - Maroochydore  QLD
settings.answer:
Based in Maroochydore, and reporting to the CEO, the responsibility of the Marketing & eCommerce Executive is to drive and execute SkinKandy‚Äôs strategic brand direction, and oversee the implementation and execution of all marketing campaigns through close partnerships with agencies, internal teams and other stakeholders.

This will include reviewing and evaluating campaign performance, spearheading market research efforts, coordinating initiatives across a variety of channels (web, SEO, eDM, Social, SEM etc), and utilising all available data to drive sales and marketing automation.

We‚Äôre looking for someone with proven experience in:

Leading and supporting a small team

Effective collaboration within a Leadership team to achieve common goals

Development and management of a national marketing calendar

Successful management of an ecommerce platform

Paid acquisition campaign planning and execution

Paid retention planning and execution

Reporting, learning and refining acquisition and retention campaigns

Promotional calendar management and execution

Strong interest in marketing automation and using data to shape strategy

Amazing attention to detail - spot a typo from a mile away

Proficiency in Shopify, or other similar CMS

Salesforce Marketing Cloud experience would be amazing

Ability to work with multiple stakeholders

A degree qualification is a must.

In return, the successful applicant will enjoy working with a supportive and experienced team, in a fun and positive workplace environment where achievements are celebrated and hard work is rewarded. If this sounds like you,

click here to apply
